name: Flamekeeper
description:
Flamekeeper

  • Play as an adorable bunny as you race to collect wood to keep your fire alive and stay warm!
  • Created for Warmth Game Jam!

Controls:

Walk over sticks to pick them up and then walk up to the fireplace to add to the fire's hearts.

  • WASD -  Movement
  • Enter - Select Menu Options
  • Escape - Pause Menu

Team:

Programmer, Music: Natalie Wass

Artist: Jo Moore
